attributes.action: Ban Aspartame from Childrens products (eg Capol) in line with EU countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like it banned completely, but it horrifies me that an artificial sweetener is put in a product when a child is at their most vunerable.
And you try getting the sugar calpol,it is like searching for a needle in a haystack. So choice is not an option.
The EU countries have banned it and we take all the other EU directives , why do we not take this one on board?
